entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The Web SDK should default the Program class in top-level statements programs to public so that it's easy to reference from test projects #30274
    8.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Watch.BrowserRefresh causes Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref 6.0 prebuilts #30272
  • Concurrency problem creating dotnet tool manifests #30254
  • NETSDK1129 incorrectly thrown during publish when TargetFrameworks is used but only a single framework is present #30251
  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that parameter default value don't change #30249
  • dotnet tool install hangs, then fails #30248
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 SDK installed, the default publish path is "/bin/Release/..." not "/bin/Debug/..." when running "dotnet publish" in CLI #30245

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 7.0.101 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.12) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29212
    7.0.2xx
  • Package 'dotnet-sdk-7.0' has no installation candidate on Xubuntu / Ubuntu 22.04 #30184

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30273
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Workload Clean #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bug with `dotnet publish -p:Foo` #30265
    Area-NetSDK
  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • READ.ME Includes PR Timeline Guide + Explain Nightly Builds in Documentation #30263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Warn if the publish profile provided is not present in the project #30239
    Area-WebSDK

Merged

  • Update the target framework for the non-restored test projects #30190
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump Wcwidth.Sources from 0.6.0 to 1.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #30247
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.3xx #30235
  • Upgrade to latest `CodeAnalysis.Workspaces`. Get rid of workarounds and cover latest supported features with Tests. #30250
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Preview branding #30203
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • Fix SupportsTargetFramework for tests - 7.0.2xx #30234
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
